title: Танкер «Танго»
overview: Purposeful and serious entrepreneur Andrei Grekov found himself in a very unpleasant situation and was forced to pay a large sum of money. However, now is not the best time in the hero's life, his property has been confiscated, and he doesn't have a penny in his pocket. The only valuables the young man has left are an old tanker, thanks to which he receives a strange order for the transportation of oil. The hero doesn't think long about the suspicious matter, because the money needs to be given back very urgently. A seemingly simple task turned out to be not so easy, and now Andrei found himself in the midst of dangerous and serious events.
